Package net.paulhertz.aifile

Class LabColor

java.lang.Object
net.paulhertz.aifile.LabColor
public class LabColor extends Object
Author:
paulhz A class for implementing the Lab colorspace. This is meant to work with a ColorConverter class that will handle RGB - CMYK - HSB - Lab color spaces and conversions from the RGB and HSB formats typical in Processing. My conversion methods were AIded: https://chat.openai.com/share/44d99906-82dd-40a7-8d9f-2f9167b74b1c.

  • Constructor Details

    • LabColor

      public LabColor(double L, double a, double b)
      Parameters:
      L - the lightness component of the Lab color (0-100)
      a - the green-red component of the Lab color (-128 to 127)
      b - the blue-yellow component of the Lab color (-128 to 127)

  • Method Details

    • convertLabtoRGB

      public static int[] convertLabtoRGB(double l, double a, double b)
      Converts a Lab color value to RGB color space.
      Parameters:
      l - the lightness component of the Lab color (0-100)
      a - the green-red component of the Lab color (-128 to 127)
      b - the blue-yellow component of the Lab color (-128 to 127)
      Returns:
      an array containing the RGB values: [red, green, blue]

    • convertRGBtoLab

      public static double[] convertRGBtoLab(int red, int green, int blue)
      Converts an RGB color value to Lab color space.
      Parameters:
      red - the red component of the RGB color (0-255)
      green - the green component of the RGB color (0-255)
      blue - the blue component of the RGB color (0-255)
      Returns:
      an array containing the Lab values: [L, a, b]
